WDY_CTLR_COMPOT.DESCRIPTION: Handling for Suspending and Resuming an Application
Error Handling Before Navigation Through Application
On Click on Columns of ALV
Method for non-action specific operations before navigation
Method for Validation of User Input
Method for Modifying the View Before Rendering
Method for Modifying the Context Menu

WDY_CTLR_PARAMT.DESCRIPTION: Identifies Click in a Cell of ALV Output

WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: * A common scenario for a supply method is to aquire key
* informations from the parameter <parent_element> and then
* A free navigation thru the context, especially to nodes on
* the same or deeper hierachical level is strongly discouraged,
* because such a strategy may easily lead to unresolvable
* if necessary, get static attributes of parent element
* DATA ls_zmmt_doa LIKE LINE OF lt_zmmt_doa.
** e.g. call a data providing FuBa
*This method supplys the data to the ZMMT_ALV component, linked to the ZMMT_DOA context node.
DATA: lo_nd_init_data TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA: lo_api_controller TYPE REF TO if_wd_controller.
DATA: lo_message_manager TYPE REF TO if_wd_message_manager.
DATA: lo_nd_enable TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
*various calls for local references of wd_components. Gets reference to the
*component controller api and retrieves references to the message manager for
*error handling message display. Retrieve the values from the INIT data to execute
*the supply call and returns teh DB Call with a local internal tables
IF sy-subrc = 1."If no DB invoke the message manager to create an error message for no data found
CONCATENATE 'No DOA approval data found for ' lv_message INTO lv_message RESPECTING BLANKS.
EXPORTING message_text = 'Unknown Error: Contact System Administrator' ).
*Binds returned table to the ZMMT_DOA context
*gets reference to the interface for the salv functions and the alv model.
*the ALV model method calls disables selectability of the rows, and sets
*scrollable column count display in the view to 8 for window limitation purposes
DATA: lo_alv_ctrl TYPE REF TO iwci_salv_wd_table.
DATA: lo_alv_model TYPE REF TO cl_salv_wd_config_table.
WHEN 'APR_CONFIRM' OR 'CONFRIM_DATE' OR 'CONFRIM_TIME' OR 'ERNAM' OR 'COMMENTS' OR 'MANDT'.
*it activates the hyperlink on the field
*This method submits the DB updates & Work item closure task
*(in an update task) after the approval has been submitted
DATA lo_nd_zmmt_doa TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_nd_workflowdata TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
*gets local reference to the context and builds internal tables of the context data
*the tables and work item id are submitted to the FM in an update task.
*calls the popup manager to display a popup to the user that the approvals have been submitted
*invalidates the node(clears vales) after the popup has been closed.
DATA: lo_comp_api TYPE REF TO if_wd_component,
ls_window_text = 'Thank You. Your approval and comments have been saved.'.
* This method removes the window reference when the popup is closed. The popup must be created again,
DATA: lo_cmp_usage TYPE REF TO if_wd_component_usage.
*Fires the method to initialize the display adjustments to the ALV Table
*Initializes the enable_function node to default 'ENABLE' status. abap_true (enabled)
DATA: lo_nd_button_data TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node,
*This method should have Event ON_CLICK from ALV Usage Component.
*This method trigger when user click on field on ALV
DATA lo_nd_zmmt_doa TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_zmmt_doa TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.
* navigate from <CONTEXT> to <ZMMT_DOA> via lead selection
*Start of calling a t-code from web dynpro
DATA: lo_api_component TYPE REF TO if_wd_component,
CONCATENATE lv_protocol lv_host ':' lv_port INTO lv_url.
*end of calling a t-code from web dynpro
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
"Gets reference to the init_dat node and binds the data to the context.
"Read of the user name is retrieved from the SAP_WAPI_READ_CONTAINER FM.
"the imported work_item is fed from the URL from the WF item and is passed
"in as the paramter when calling the Webdynpro from the task.
DATA lo_nd_init_data TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_nd_workflowdata TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA ls_container LIKE LINE OF lt_container.
READ TABLE lt_container WITH KEY element = 'USERID' INTO ls_container.
